field.name: summary
field.value: STViewEngine not reloading changed template files

field.name: description
field.value:
Build app using STViewEngine. Open browser and start app. Change and save [one of] the view file use by the current action. Reload that action in browser. Changes to view file would no be reflected in output because ST is still using cached copy.
This is due to an issue in the underlying StringTemplate library. It's already fixed but the SVN depot needs to be updated.
